content: welcome to visit my pattern shop http //www ravelry com/people/cathyren crochet pattern tropical fish u s term abbreviation chain = chain st = stitch s single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch ea = each material color a any color about 6 yards color b any color about 2 yards color c at your choice any color about 2 yards hook any weight with propitiate size hook i use hook us 4 / 3 5 mm for light weight worsted yarn yarn sewing needle this is a way to use your left over yarn cathyren© this pattern is copyrighted it is for personal use only you may not rewrite resell or trade it page 1 pattern color b tip you can make bigger fish by round 8 chain 1 single_crochet around join 24 st working a couple more rounds along color a with increasing 3 sts/round round 9 chain 1 single_crochet around join 24 st note chain 1s at beginning each round are not counted as st color a round 1 make a magic loop chain 1 work 6 single_crochet in loop pull the magic loop tight join with a sl st into 1st single_crochet round 2 chain 1 *single_crochet 1 2 single_crochet in next st* repeat around join 9 st round 3 chain 1 *single_crochet 2 2 single_crochet in next st* repeat around join 12 st flatten the work in half round 4 chain 1 *single_crochet 3 2 single_crochet in next st* repeat around join 15 st round 5 chain 1 *single_crochet 4 2 single_crochet in next st* repeat around join 18 st color b round 6 chain 1 *single_crochet 5 2 single_crochet in next st* repeat around join 21` st tip you can change color in any round as you like chain 1 single_crochet each pair of front and back st together across to the end 12 see picture on color a next page round 7 chain 1 *single_crochet 6 2 single_crochet in next st* repeat cut yarn and fasten_off around join 24 st cathyren© this pattern is copyrighted it is for personal use only you may not rewrite resell or trade it page 2 fork tail row 1 picture tail fork or round row 2 attach a different color yarn in top of chain 4 on the right side chain 3 slip_stitch fork tail in 2nd chain half_double_crochet in same top chain of chain 4 any color you like single_crochet next slip_stitch in next single_crochet in next half_double_crochet in top of chain 4 chain 2 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook chain 1 slip_stitch in same top chain of chain 4 see picture below row 1 count 6th st from right side of last row attach yarn in it chain 4 2 treble_crochet st in same st 2 treble_crochet in next st chain 4 slip_stitch in same st cut yarn and fasten_off weave in yarn ends cut yarn and fasten_off cathyren© this pattern is copyrighted it is for personal
